name: Green Easter Special
description:
You receive a tiny box in the middle of midnight while you crave for easter eggs. Turns out you have been visited by 20 fairies from the land of Chegovia! Answer the questions to release them from their eggs!

WARNING: This game contains spoilers from my games! You can try it for fun anyway. Most of the spoilers are not harmful, but others are! For example egg2, egg12, egg4, egg18.

****Game is not proofread, if you encounter any mistake, feel free to contact me via Tumblr or Twitter about it.

:Hints:

Eggs by game.

CREDITS:

Done with Ren'py visual novel engine

Music and SFX by Tam music factory.
